summary:
I am an experienced seller and L&D Consultant with a clear focus towards value generation through the delivery of measurable returns for clients, stakeholders and the businesses alike. I have an exceptional capability to manage projects, from initial inception to successful completion, under tight resourcing constraints and to the specific needs of both internal and external client groups.

I have been responsible for induction training programmes of 4-6 weeks that focussed on corporate policies and procedures, product knowledge, IT systems and the soft skills required to carry out a service based role. I was responsible for the ongoing development of the employees which included liaising with the CSM to conduct and report upon the full learning cycle.
 As a training consultant  and seller in the B2B, long cycle sales arena, I sold  and trained commercial skills (selling, negotiating, communicating) to organisations across the world. I've trained procurement professionals in negotiation skills in an Oil & Gas organisation in places such as Columbia, Trinidad, Pakistan, Angola and Algeria; I've trained Sales professionals in Selling in Manufacturing organisations in China, Singapore, UAE and most of Europe; for a financial services organisation I trained five commercial skills programmes on a train-the-trainer basis in over 30 countries including USA, Australia and New Zealand. This means I have a strong cultural awareness when selling and delivering training across borders and can adapt and be credible across the world. 

In addition to the traditional classroom training, I have been instrumental in developing and delivering training in the virtual environment. I have used Microsoft Lync and Adobe Connect Pro to deliver skills development programmes to geographically spread learners to the same level of engagement and skill improvement as their traditional classroom colleagues.

profile_positions.description: Responsible for the programme management of L&D programmes and projects at a global level
profile_positions.title: Manager L&D Products and Programs

profile_positions.description: Responsible for the Learning and Development of the Global Finance department at Booking.com
profile_positions.title: Global Learning Manager

profile_positions.description: Responsible for partnering with key stakeholders within the Finance teams to ensure that their learning needs are met throughout the year either by developing bespoke workshops or procuring the right external providers.
profile_positions.title: Senior Global Learning Specialist (Finance)

profile_positions.description:
I am passionate about Learning and Development and truly believe that it is an essential part of the growth and future of any organisation. I work closely with clients of all sizes to deliver measurable results in the classroom and beyond.
I'm responsible for creating/generating business with training organisations to deliver their portfolio of training programmes to international, business-to-business organisations; promote, sell, negotiate and develop own business with contractors; provide outstanding classroom and virtual training delivery to a broad range of industries, experiences and levels of seniority; and provide ongoing consultancy to trained audiences.
profile_positions.title: Learning and Development Consultant

profile_positions.description:
LeasePlan is a global fleet management and driver mobility company of Dutch origin. Our full service offering consists of financing and operational fleet management services to meet the needs of a diverse client base. Established in 1963, we have grown to become the world’s leading global fleet management and driver mobility company with more than 85% of our 7,400 strong workforce now operating outside the Netherlands. Our global franchise manages over 1.6 million multi-brand vehicles and provides global fleet management and driver mobility services in 32 countries. We have a proven track record in enhancing our presence in traditional mature fleet markets, as well as expanding into new markets and growing our business to market leading positions. We are able to capitalise on our global presence and international network by providing innovative products and high quality service to meet the needs of our clients globally. We aim to do this by using our expertise to make running a fleet easier for our clients. This is reflected in our universal promise to all our clients: “It’s easier to leaseplan”.

The purpose of my role:
•	To be the senior learning & development consultant working with key stakeholders/internal clients/subject matter experts to lead learning & development work streams for a range of identified international and specialist projects/assignments
•	To partner with internal client groups to understand and manage learning initiatives for them around a continuous cycle of needs analysis, design, project management & logistics, deployment & evaluation as they relate to the LP strategy and engage resources from the relevant entities, specialist functions or external suppliers to create best fit solutions
•	To consistently link learning and development to business performance and ensure that solutions include a clearly defined set of KPIs and/or SLAs along with an agreed format for evaluation of the personal and business impact of the training intervention.
profile_positions.title: International Learning and Development Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Huthwaite International provide solutions in sales, negotiation, communication and coaching, to deliver sustained sales and service performance improvement for organisations across the globe. In order to help our clients achieve commercial excellence we follow a four-stage consultative process that’s central to everything we do. We call this the Huthwaite Approach, and it’s key to how we change sales results by changing behaviour.

I am Responsible for: 
- Proactively generating new business and growing existing business within the HI client portfolio
- Leading bids that have the goal of differentiating and building value for HI solutions, which includes writing persuasive proposals and /or delivering presentations in response to client requests and normally in competitive situations
- Leading commercial negotiations in order to create collaborative win-win implementations
- Directing account teams to ensure successful design, delivery and project management of global training projects
- Maintaining and developing client relationships to ensure long term and sustainable implementations
profile_positions.title: Client Director

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for: 
- Generating new business and growing existing business within the HI client portfolio
- Leading client meetings to differentiate and build value for HI solutions
- Develop strong client relationships at all levels
- Writing persuasive proposals and /or deliver presentations in response to client requests and normally in competitive situations
- Successful design, delivery and project management of global training projects including the management of the account team within HI and the client organisation
- Delivery of local/global training programmes to groups of differing seniority up to and including board level
- Offer consultancy led design and customisation of training to ensure maximum return on investment for both the client and HI
profile_positions.title: Business Development Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Project manage global training projects from initial set up and design through to post implementation and embedding of new skills.
 - Liaise with HI international network and the client network to ensure the right trainer is in the right venue with the right materials when required.
 - Work with the client to customise training materials e.g. writing roleplays, complex sales simulations and negotiation case studies.
 - Deliver the HI portfolio of training programmes to clients around the globe to all levels of people from sales rep through to VP.
 - Work in conjunction with the client to develop bespoke solutions to meet their training requirements, this can be anything from a 2 hour slot in a new product launch to a three day programme covering a combination of skills sets (sales, negs, meetings coaching etc).
profile_positions.title: Engagement Consultant
